flavorText: Souls and steel, the essence of Mirrodin. Memnarch lacks one but has an abundance of the other.

foreignData.flavorText: Seelen und Stahl: die Substanz von Mirrodin. Memnarch hat einen Mangel an einem und Überfluss am anderen.
foreignData.name: Totem des Geizes
foreignData.text: {5}: Tausche die Kontrolle über das Totem des Geizes und über eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, aus.

foreignData.flavorText: Almas y acero: la esencia de Mirrodin. Memnarch carece de uno de estos elementos, pero del otro le sobra.
foreignData.name: Tótem de la avaricia
foreignData.text: {5}: Intercambia el control del Tótem de la avaricia por el del permanente objetivo que no sea tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: L'âme et l'acier, l'essence même de Mirrodin. Memnarch n'a pas la première, mais il possède l'autre en abondance.
foreignData.name: Totem d'avarice
foreignData.text: {5} : Échangez le contrôle du Totem d'avarice contre celui du permanent non-terrain ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Anime e acciaio, le essenze di Mirrodin. A Memnarch ne manca una, ma in compenso abbonda dell'altra.
foreignData.name: Totem della Cupidigia
foreignData.text: {5}: Scambia il controllo del Totem della Cupidigia e di un permanente non terra bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 魂と鋼はミラディンの本質だ。メムナークにはその片方が欠けているが、もう片方が有り余っている。
foreignData.name: 強欲のトーテム像
foreignData.text: {5}：土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それと強欲のトーテム像のコントロールを交換する。

foreignData.flavorText: Almas e aço, a essência de Mirrodin. O Memnarca tem pouco de um mas fartura do outro.
foreignData.name: Totem da Avareza
foreignData.text: {5}: Permute o controle de Totem da Avareza e da permanente alvo que não seja um terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: 魂魄与铁骨二者是为秘罗地之精华。蒙纳珂长于其一却匮于其二。
foreignData.name: 贪欲图腾像
foreignData.text: {5}：交换贪欲图腾像与目标非地的永久物之操控权。

name: Avarice Totem
originalText: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.

rulings.text: It is possible to activate this ability in response to itself and generate some odd combinations. For example, if you control this card and another permanent, you can use this card’s ability and target the permanent you control. You can then use this card’s ability again and target a permanent your opponent controls. The second usage resolves first and you get your opponent’s permanent in exchange for this one. The first usage then resolves and swaps your other permanent for the Totem so you get it back. The net effect is that you can swap any non-land permanent you have for any of theirs if you can activate this ability twice. Note that your opponent does get the chance to use the Totem in between the resolutions of your two usages if they have the mana.

text: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.
